sentence: The image is a screenshot of a webpage from the "5 Star Affiliate Blog," which is part of the "5 Star Affiliate Programs" website.
sentence_cn: 该图片是“5 Star Affiliate Blog”网页的截图，该博客是“5 Star Affiliate Programs”网站的一部分。

sentence: It has a blue color scheme with a large banner at the top.
sentence_cn: 它采用蓝色配色方案，顶部有一个大横幅。

sentence: The banner includes the site name and a logo with the words "BizProfits" and a "Sign Up Now" button.
sentence_cn: 横幅包含网站名称和带有“BizProfits”字样的徽标以及“立即注册”按钮。

sentence: Below the banner, there's a navigation menu with options like "Blog Home," "Affiliate Marketing," "Blog Revenue," "Managers & Merchants," "Niche Marketing," and "SEO-SEM-PPC."
sentence_cn: 横幅下方有一个导航菜单，其中有“博客主页”、“联属营销”、“博客收入”、“经理和商家”、“利基营销”和“SEO-SEM-PPC”等选项。

sentence: The main content features a blog post titled "Flipboard Takes the Leap To Video Ads," dated August 24, 2015, authored by Caitlynne Cush.
sentence_cn: 主要内容为凯特琳·库什 (Caitlynne Cush) 于 2015 年 8 月 24 日发表的一篇博文，题为“Flipboard 进军视频广告领域”。
words: Flipboard Takes the Leap To Video Ads,

sentence: The post has zero comments and is categorized under "SMM - Video Ads."
sentence_cn: 该帖子没有评论，分类为“SMM - 视频广告”。

sentence: The article discusses Flipboard's new feature allowing users and brands to submit video ads, called "Cinema Loops."
sentence_cn: 文章讨论了 Flipboard 的新功能，该功能允许用户和品牌提交视频广告，称为“Cinema Loops”。

sentence: On the right, there's a search bar and a share button with a counter displaying "5."
sentence_cn: 右侧有一个搜索栏和一个分享按钮，计数器显示“5”。

sentence: Below that, there is a dropdown menu for selecting categories and a section titled "5 Star Affiliate Marketing."
sentence_cn: 下面是一个用于选择类别的下拉菜单和一个名为“五星级联盟营销”的部分。
